name: Roll the Hive
description:
Roll the Hive

Help a swarm of bees survive by taking control over their beehive and collect as many queen bees as possible before all of the swarm gets lost in the drying out grassland. Queen bees help unite the swarm and keeping the hive healthy, with the indicator bar visible on the left of the screen.

Try to beat your highscore in this chilled out, but mind-boggling hive-dice-roller game. 

Controls
  • Roll Beehive - Keys 1 to 6
  • Back to Main Menu - Esc   

Best played in fullscreen.

Credits

This game was made in 50 hours as part of the GMTK Game Jam 2022 with the jam theme "Roll of the Dice" by:

  • The Fifth King / Discord: The Fifth King#0005 / Design Lead and Programming
  • SpyPlayer / Discord: Marvin#4012 / Programming Lead
  • Ryanocerou5 / Discord: Ryanocerou5#3266 / Audio Lead
  • localcryptid / Discord: localcryptid#1933 / Art Lead
